pkgmetadata.longdescription: R We There Yet? Visualizing MCMC Convergence in Phylogenetics // Implements various tests, visualizations, and metrics for diagnosing convergence of MCMC chains in phylogenetics. It implements and automates many of the functions of the AWTY package in the R environment, as well as a host of other functions. Warren, Geneva, and Lanfear (2017), doi:10.1093/molbev/msw279.
